ISSUE.TITLE: VendorModel: Set PictureModel in PrepareVendorModelAsync
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.70 Steps to reproduce the problem: In VendorModel, there is a PictureModel property; however, it is not being set in the PrepareVendorModelAsync method. As a result, when users attempt to use the vendor's picture on pages like Views/Catalog/Vendor.cshtml, the picture is unavailable and returned as null. This means the vendor's image cannot be displayed or used on these pages.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #7291 from OzanOzcelikk/fix/vendor-model-picture Set `PictureModel` in `PrepareVendorModelAsync` method
